title: lazydocker
text:
lazydocker

The lazydocker commandlet allows to install and use lazydocker.


ATTENTION:
Currently this feature is new and therefore experimental.
It may change in incompatible ways in the next releases until we reach a stable state.
We hope that all is working fine for you.
However, do not expect everything to work out of the box.


The arguments (devon lazydocker «args») are explained by the following table:


Table 23. Usage of devon lazydocker






Argument(s)
Meaning




setup
install lazydocker on your machine.


«args»
call lazydocker by executing the command 'devon lazydocker'. Call lazydocker --help for details or use lazydocker directly as preferred.""
